name: Faye wars
description:
Inspired by custom StarCraft II maps and made in three days, a fun small RTS where you send waves of minions to their expendable death in hopes of destroying the opponents base.

How to Play;

Place troops stamps by clicking on the button then moving your mouse over the chessboard then left click.

Every 20 seconds a new wave will spawn, sending your formations forward were they will clash in the middle.

Destroy the enemies bases before they destroy yours.

We love strategy and tactics we hope to create a dynamic war stimulation, with the ultimate goal of making it multiplayer!

If you like the idea of the game let us know in the comments!
